header.rec_loc: Dining room at home, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Cooking, baked Alaska, grating cheese, Halloween party, recruiting, memories, discrimination, age of consent.

speaker.fls: French -- limited; Spanish -- limited; Swahili -- limited
